description.en: Kava is a cross-chain DeFi Hub for decentralized financial services and applications. The Kava DeFi Hub operates like a decentralized bank for digital assets connecting users with products like stablecoins, loans, and interest-bearing accounts so that they can do more and earn more with their digital assets.
